question: India’s Health Ministry and WHO have decided to deploy the WHO’s surveillance network of which disease, for fighting Covid-19?
explanation:
The Union Ministry of Health and Family Welfare and World Health Organization have decided to deploy the WHO’s National polio surveillance network (NPSN) and associated field staff, for fighting Covid-19.
The NPSP team members will also extend their support by sharing information and best practices from their previous experience gained during Polio eradication process. The WHO field staff will assist in immunization, surveillance and elimination of Tuberculosis and Neglected Tropical Diseases.
